message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $160. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140 to make this work. What do you say?
I'm getting close, but $140 is still a bit steep for me. Can you meet me at $110?
